mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, nickname,salt,birthday,gender,height,weight, email, wx_openid, user_status, register_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password},#{nickname}, #{salt}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{height}, #{weight},#{email}, #{wxOpenid}, #{userStatus}, #{registerTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, salt = #{salt}, email = #{email}, birthday = #{birthday}, gender = #{gender}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, wx_openid = #{wxOpenid}, user_status = #{userStatus} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE user SET avatar = #{avatar} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE YEAR(register_time) = #{year} AND MONTH(register_time) = #{month}
